author: cantide5ga
name: pluto-rd
description: Simple blogging library with word cloud navigation.

scripts.init: rm -rf .git && sudo npm install && npm init && git init
scripts.build: npm run build:tsc && npm run bundle
scripts.prepack: npm run build && cp -r src/typedef build/src && cp package.json build && cp typings.json build
scripts.test:all: npm run pretest && npm run unit && npm run int && npm run func
scripts.test:unit: npm run pretest && npm run unit
scripts.test:int: npm run pretest && npm run int
scripts.test:func: npm run pretest && npm run func
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && npm run prepack && npm publish build
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm run prepack && npm publish build
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm run prepack && npm publish build
scripts.publish:prerelease: npm version prerelease && npm run prepack && npm publish build --tag beta
